import {React, useState, useContext, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import {Col, Row, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, CustomInput, Button } from 'reactstrap' const moment = require('moment') import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form' import classnames from 'classnames' import { isObjEmpty, selectThemeColors } from '@utils' import { ArrowLeft, ArrowRight } from 'react-feather' import axios from 'axios' import Select from 'react-select' import Flatpickr from 'react-flatpickr' import "flatpickr/dist/themes/material_green.css" const Details_of_changes = ({ stepper, type }) => { const { register, errors, handleSubmit, trigger } = useForm() const onSubmit = (data, e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(data) // trigger() // if (isObjEmpty(errors)) { stepper.next() // } } return ( {/*
Details Of Changes
Enter Details Of Changes.
*/}
onSubmit(data, e))}> {errors.b_component && errors.b_component.type === 'required' && Please enter component} {errors.b_supplier_name && errors.b_supplier_name.type === 'required' && Please enter supplier} {errors.b_price && errors.b_price.type === 'required' && Please enter price} {errors.b_volume_per_month && errors.b_volume_per_month.type === 'required' && Please enter supplier} {errors.b_cost && errors.b_cost.type === 'required' && Please enter cost} {errors.a_component && errors.a_component.type === 'required' && Please enter component} {errors.a_supplier_name && errors.a_supplier_name.type === 'required' && Please enter supplier} {errors.a_price && errors.a_price.type === 'required' && Please enter price} {errors.a_volume_per_month && errors.a_volume_per_month.type === 'required' && Please enter volume per month} {errors.a_cost && errors.a_cost.type === 'required' && Please enter cost} {errors.financial_implications && errors.financial_implications.type === 'required' && Please select financial implications} {errors.effect_on_customer && errors.effect_on_customer.type === 'required' && Please enter effect on customer} {errors.remarks && errors.remarks.type === 'required' && Please enter remarks}
stepper.previous()}> Previous Next
) } export default Details_of_changes
